channel.title: Fahim Final News Feed
channel.description: Curated important news from multiple sources

item.title: Tanzania president re-elected in polls marred by violence
item.description: Importance: 104.2 | Covered by 10 feeds | Reputation: 8.4 Matched titles: - Tanzania Election Turns Deadly As President Hassan Wins - Video: Tanzania president declared winner amid deadly election unrest - Tanzania's Samia Hassan declared landslide winner in election marred by violence - Tanzania's Hassan declared landslide winner in election marred by violence - Tanzania President Hassan wins disputed election with more than 97% of vote, official results show - Samia Suluhu Hassan wins Tanzania's presidential election - Tanzanian president wins in landslide after deadly protests - Samia wins Tanzania election with 98% of votes amid unrest - Tanzania’s Hassan declared landslide winner in election that triggered violent protests - Tanzania President Hassan wins disputed election with more than 97% of vote, official results show - Tanzania's Hassan declared landslide winner in election marred by violence - Tanzania President Hassan wins disputed election with over 97% of votes - Tanzanian President Samia Suluhu Hassan declared winner of election - Urgent: Samia Suluhu Hassan wins Tanzania's presidential election
